mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(t.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') AS date_str, SUM(t.plan_money) AS num FROM coupon t where t.verify = 2 and t.plan_money is not null AND t.create_time BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY date_str ORDER BY date_str

SELECT concat(DATE_FORMAT(t.create_time,'%Y'),'/', LPAD(WEEKOFYEAR(t.create_time),2,0),'周') AS date_str, SUM(t.plan_money) AS num FROM coupon t where t.verify = 2 and t.plan_money is not null AND t.create_time BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY date_str ORDER BY date_str

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(t.create_time,'%Y/%m月') AS date_str, SUM(t.plan_money) AS num FROM coupon t where t.verify = 2 and t.plan_money is not null AND t.create_time BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY date_str ORDER BY date_str

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(o.create_datetime,'%Y-%m-%d') AS date_str, SUM(o.price_discount) AS num FROM coupon_receive t left join pay_order o on (t.pay_order_id = o.pay_order_id) where t.status=4 AND o.status_active=5 AND o.create_datetime BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY date_str ORDER BY date_str

SELECT concat(DATE_FORMAT(o.create_datetime,'%Y'),'/', LPAD(WEEKOFYEAR(t.create_datetime),2,0),'周') AS date_str, SUM(o.price_discount) AS num FROM coupon_receive t left join pay_order o on (t.pay_order_id = o.pay_order_id) where t.status=4 AND o.status_active=5 AND o.create_datetime BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY date_str ORDER BY date_str

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(o.create_datetime,'%Y/%m月') AS date_str, SUM(o.price_discount) AS num FROM coupon_receive t left join pay_order o on (t.pay_order_id = o.pay_order_id) where t.status=4 AND o.status_active=5 AND o.create_datetime BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY date_str ORDER BY date_str

SELECT t.coupon_id AS date_str, SUM(o.price_pay) AS num FROM coupon_receive t LEFT JOIN pay_order o ON (t.pay_order_id = o.pay_order_id) WHERE t.status=4 AND o.status_active=5 AND o.create_datetime BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY t.coupon_id

SELECT c.coupon_id, COUNT(t.uid) FROM coupon_receive t LEFT JOIN coupon_env ev ON(t.coupon_env_id = ev.coupon_env_id) LEFT JOIN coupon c ON(t.coupon_id=c.coupon_id) WHERE ev.type = 1 AND t.`status` = 4 AND t.create_datetime BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY c.coupon_id

SELECT t.coupon_id AS date_str, SUM(o.price_discount) AS num FROM coupon_receive t LEFT JOIN pay_order o ON (t.pay_order_id = o.pay_order_id) WHERE t.status=4 AND o.status_active=5 AND o.create_datetime BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY t.coupon_id

SELECT CONCAT(n.cus_province,' ',n.cus_city,' ', n.cus_area) AS date_str, n.num FROM( SELECT o.cus_province,o.cus_city, o.cus_area, SUM(o.price_discount) AS num FROM coupon_receive t LEFT JOIN pay_order o ON (t.pay_order_id = o.pay_order_id) WHERE t.status=4 AND o.status_active=5 AND o.create_datetime BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY o.cus_province,o.cus_city, o.cus_area ) n ORDER BY date_str
